,"147829":4,"147830":1,"147832":24,"147833":1,"147846":1,"147852":2,"147855":1,"147866":1,"147975":2,"148084":2,"148111":1,"148114":6,"148146":1,"148178":1,"148190":1,"148214":1,"148227":2,"148247":1,"148339":1,"148354":1,"148401":1,"148404":2,"148406":1,"148410":1,"148453":2,"148483":4,"148499":4,"148500":15,"148536":3,"148538":1,"148539":4,"148543":3,"148561":1,"148604":1,"148610":1,"148613":1,"148631":4,"148632":2,"148633":1,"148639":1,"148643":3,"148645":8,"148652":1,"148662":1,"148670":1,"148732":1,"148735":1,"148743":2,"148764":8,"148775":1,"148807":2,"148822":1,"148828":5,"148833":1,"148840":5,"148851":1,"148865":1,"148866":5,"148873":10,"148933":15,"148934":1,"148965":1,"148973":1,"149027":5,"149034":7,"149048":7,"149095":1,"149103":2,"149138":4,"149146":1,"149148":3,"149149":3,"149151":3,"149152":8,"149153":1,"149172":2,"149202":2,"149208":3,"149218":3,"149241":4,"149246":1,"149259":3,"149261":2,"149266":4,"149283":4,"149357":2,"149398":19,"149437":1,"149455":2,"149473":2,"149477":3,"149487":2,"149526":1,"149615":1,"149617":1,"149628":6,"149654":2,"149663":1,"149669":1,"149670":5,"149673":1,"149710":1,"149737":2,"149776":2,"149786":1,"149816":1,"149837":3,"149856":1,"149875":1,"149886":1,"149907":2,"149966":1,"149983":1,"149995":1,"150003":2,"150019":1,"150080":1,"150105":1,"150110":1,"150124":2,"150127":12,"150140":1,"150168":1,"150177":1,"150186":2,"150203":1,"150209":2,"150258":6,"150340":1,"150357":2,"150402":8,"150411":1,"150432":1,"150473":6,"150534":1,"150578":2,"150646":1,"150662":1,"150664":1,"150672":1,"150693":1,"150726":3,"150742":1,"150748":3,"150820":3,"150821":1,"150835":1,"150860":3,"150871":2,"150929":1,"150961":1,"150973":3,"150993":1,"151013":1,"151066":1,"151111":1,"151124":3,"151173":1,"151242":4,"151252":2,"151255":1,"151264":10,"151288":2,"151295":1,"151321":15,"151329":2,"151369":3,"151416":7,"151475":1,"151487":8,"151499":23,"151524":4,"151555":1,"151580":23,"151582":13,"151645":1,"151771":1,"151789":1,"151811":1,"151813":1,"151865":1,"151954":3,"151963":1,"151965":1,"151991":2,"152024":2,"152026":6,"152034":3,"152054":2,"152077":1,"152111":1,"152137":37,"152212":1,"152237":1,"152271":2,"152282":1,"152304":2,"152325":3,"152391":3,"152394":11,"152409":1,"152461":3,"152462":5,"152517":1,"152539":3,"152580":2,"152615":1,"152651":1,"152673":25,"152678":3,"152740":2,"152769":1,"152797":6,"152806":1,"152842":7,"152847":1,"152848":5,"152862":6,"152885":1,"152923":11,"152955":2,"152981":1,"153010":1,"153022":1,"153026":1,"153027":1,"153034":1,"153037":1,"153044":4,"153082":2,"153092":1,"153096":15,"153100":3,"153157":1,"153158":4,"153166":7,"153170":1,"153193":3,"153218":3,"153229":3,"153262":3,"153309":1,"153371":22,"153381":2,"153432":1,"153465":1,"153482":15,"153511":19,"153516":13,"153523":12,"153529":1,"153533":2,"153552":6,"153557":1,"153558":1,"153576":4,"153581":1,"153594":1,"153607":1,"153640":1,"153645":1,"153669":1,"153706":6,"153741":1,"153753":4,"153760":1,"153818":1,"153839":1,"153840":1,"153852":1,"153899":1,"153904":1,"153939":7,"153961":1,"153962":1,"153974":1,"153987":2,"153996":1,"154001":1,"154006":1,"154015":2,"154019":2,"154044":1,"154056":21,"154070":1,"154090":2,"154107":1,"154176":1,"154189":1,"154190":1,"154192":2,"154193":2,"154200":1,"154204":1,"154207":84,"154217":1,"154227":1,"154248":1,"154265":3,"154288":1,"154291":1,"154311":4,"154312":6,"154341":1,"154366":1,"154377":1,"154389":1,"154390":1,"154394":6,"154409":5,"154410":18,"154419":2,"154422":1,"154425":1,"154469":5,"154485":1,"154526":1,"154547":2,"154580":1,"154586":3,"154592":1,"154598":2,"154602":2,"154604":1,"154613":4,"154689":1,"154692":1,"154697":1,"154698":1,"154712":2,"154720":1,"154728":1,"154761":1,"154788":9,"154790":3,"154803":1,"154809":3,"154833":1,"154838":4,"154851":2,"154869":1,"154877":5,"154878":12,"154879":2,"154886":1,"154890":8,"154902":1,"154910":1,"154931":1,"154944":1,"154956":3,"154962":1,"154968":1,"154971":1,"154997":2,"155003":1,"155009":2,"155012":1,"155030":2,"155032":1,"155050":1,"155054":1,"155057":2,"155063":6,"155065":8,"155077":4,"155085":5,"155090":1,"155098":8,"155110":1,"155116":9,"155117":2,"155196":1,"155203":3,"155247":1,"155286":1,"155290":1,"155334":7,"155335":2,"155345":1,"155360":2,"155379":4,"155382":4,"155406":1,"155414":2,"155417":1,"155418":4,"155422":3,"155439":1,"155443":4,"155447":1,"155469":2,"155473":8,"155503":2,"155504":1,"155505":1,"155506":2,"155518":1,"155523":1,"155549":5,"155566":1,"155574":1,"155612":1,"155620":1,"155623":1,"155647":4,"155651":9,"155663":1,"155670":1,"155671":1,"155690":7,"155694":3,"155695":1,"155718":4,"155762":4,"155793":1,"155795":1,"155801":8,"155804":1,"155805":8,"155810":1,"155812":1,"155813":1,"155815":1,"155830":1,"155836":1,"155848":1,"155859":1,"155871":1,"155872":2,"155884":1,"155885":2,"155891":1,"155905":1,"155908":1,"155911":2,"155928":1,"155929":1,"155936":1,"155938":1,"155968":1,"155981":1,"155996":1,"156000":2,"156010":1,"156039":2,"156081":1,"156137":1,"156151":3,"156255":1,"156256":1,"156312":1,"156315":2};
 
         $(function () {
             var acList = $('.ac_booking_count');
             var acId;
             var curElm;
             var cnt;
 
             if (!acList.length) {
                 return;
             }
 
             for (var idx in acList.toArray()) {
                 curElm = $(acList[idx]);
                 acId = curElm.attr('data-id');
 
                 if (acId in VtActivityInfo) {
                     cnt = VtActivityInfo[acId];
 
                     if (cnt > 1) {
                         curElm.find('.ac_booking_count_value').text(''.replace(':cnt:', VtActivityInfo[acId]));
 
                         //Show the popular icon
                         if (cnt > 9 && false) {
                             curElm.find('.ac_booking_count_icon').text('').show();
                         }
 
                         curElm.show();
                     }
                 }
             }
         });
     })();
   </script>
   <meta content="s7WQIhDutmiMmBO4Rdc_7ksscTS3IssmvPyMlXrFiUw" name="google-site-verification"/>
   <script type="text/javascript">
    var _vwo_code=(function(){

   </script>

   <div class="description" id="H1Title" style="display:none">
    <h1 class="headline">
     Hawaii tours &amp; activities, fun things to do in Hawaii. | HawaiiActivities.com
    </h1>
    Book Hawaii tours, activities, things to do, tourist attraction tickets and sightseeing tours  on VELTRA - HawaiiActivities.com.  Call us today to talk to local Hawaii agent at 1 (877) 877-1222.

   <div class=" ha_site" id="EnRenewal">
    <div id="HeaderWrapper">
     <div class="eu_cookies_container">
      <div class="top_info_banner_eu_cookies">
       <p class="eu_cookies_text">
        This site uses cookies. By continuing to browse the site you are agreeing to our use of cookies.
        <a href="/en/privacy">
         Find out more here
        </a>
       </p>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="container">
      <div id="haHeaderLogo">
       <a href="/">
        <img alt="hawaiiactivities.com powered by VELTRA" border="0" src="/_tr/vt/1/img/v2/img_logo_ha_veltra01.png"/>
       </a>
      </div>
      <script type="text/javascript">
       $(document).ready(function(){
     var form_name = 'tr_header_form1';
     var baseUrl = 'https://phoenix-search-api-prod.appspot.com/swan/public/';
     var indexId = "prod-phoenix-activity-en";
     var areaLang = "";
     var categoryLang = "";
     
     if(LANG_ID == 1) {
         areaLang = 'Area';
         categoryLang = 'Category';
     } else if(LANG_ID == 2) {
         areaLang = '';
         categoryLang = '';
     } else if(LANG_ID == 3) {
         areaLang = '';
         categoryLang = '';
     } else if(LANG_ID == 4) {
         areaLang = '';
         categoryLang = '';
     }
     
     var origin_id = '50106';
     var kw_type = 'region';
     var originPropertyName = "";
     var targetAreaCode = "";
     var search_kw = $('.search_kw').val();
     var search_default_val = $('.search_kw').attr('default_value');
     var search_placeholder = $('.search_kw').attr('placeholder');
     // use placeholder if placeholder exist 
     if(search_placeholder){
         search_default_val = search_placeholder;
     }
     // disable button if kw input empty 
     $('#kw_btn').attr('disabled', true);
     // prevent submit form 
     $("#"+form_name ).unbind('submit').bind('submit',function(e){ e.preventDefault();});
     // check default val 
     if(search_kw && search_kw !== search_default_val){  
         $('#kw_btn').attr('disabled', false);
         $("#"+form_name).unbind('submit'); 
     }
 
     // others than JP, block if using default val
     $('.search_kw').keyup(function() {
         //trim val 
         var value = $.trim($(this).val());
         // prevent default value
         if(value == search_default_val){
             value = '';
         } 
 
         if(value.length != 0) {
             $('#kw_btn').attr('disabled', false);
             $("#"+form_name ).unbind('submit');
         }else{
             $('#kw_btn').attr('disabled', true);
             $("#"+form_name ).unbind('submit').bind('submit',function(e){ e.preventDefault();});
         }
     });   
 
     if(kw_type == 'global') {
         originPropertyName = "root";
         targetAreaCode = "area";
     } else if(kw_type == 'region') {
         originPropertyName = "region";
         targetAreaCode = "area";
     } else if(kw_type == 'area') {
         originPropertyName = "area";
         targetAreaCode = "origin1";
     } else if(kw_type == 'origin1') {
         originPropertyName = "origin1";
         targetAreaCode = "origin2";
     } else if(kw_type == 'origin2') {
         originPropertyName = "origin2";
         targetAreaCode = "origin2";
     } 
 
     if(kw_type !== null) {
         // (function( $, undefined ) { ... }( siba.jQuery )); 
         // sibaSuggestion 
         // siba.jQuery v1.11.3 JQuery
         (function( $, undefined ) {
         $("#" + form_name + " input[type=text]").sibaSuggestion({
             baseUrl: baseUrl,
             indexId: indexId,
             docType: "activity",
             templateName: "phoenix-activity-searchSuggestion",
             originId: origin_id,
             originPropertyName: originPropertyName,
             targetAreaCode: targetAreaCode,
             areaSuggestionSize: 10,
             categorySuggestionSize: 10,
             areaLang: areaLang,
             categoryLang: categoryLang,
             onSelect: function(value){
                 var url = HOST_NAME + "/" + SITE_CODE + value;
                 window.location = url;
                 return false;
             }
         }).autocomplete('option', 'appendTo', '#keyword_search_dropdown');
         }( siba.jQuery ));
 
         // position adjustment for PC
         var kw_js_mobile_site = false;
         if(kw_js_mobile_site == false){
             $(window).resize(function(){
                 $('.suggest_class').offset({left: $('#kw').offset().left});
             });
         } else {
             $('#keyword_search_dropdown').width($('.form_inner').width());
             window.addEventListener("orientationchange", function() {
                 setTimeout(function()
                 { 
                     $('#keyword_search_dropdown').width($('.form_inner').width());
                 }, 500);
             }, false);
 
             $('#kw').focus(function(){
                 setTimeout(function() {window.scrollTo(0, $("#kw").offset().top);},0);
             });
         }
     }
 });
 
 $(window).load(function(){
     // always shows the auto complete list whenever iPhone users tap on the 'Done'.
     var iOS = ( navigator.userAgent.match(/iPad|iPhone|iPod/g) ? true : false );
     if(iOS == true) {
         var blurOccurred;
         var default_kw_val = $('#kw').val();
         $('#kw').blur(function(e){
             blurOccurred = window.setTimeout(function() {
                 if($('#kw').val().length > 0 && $('#kw').val() != default_kw_val){
                     $('#keyword_search_dropdown .suggest_class').show();
                 }
               }, 150);
         });
     }
 });
      </script>

          <input class="ha_search_box please_input search_kw" default_value="" id="kw" name="data[kw]" style="color: #666;" type="text" value=""/>
          <input id="area" name="data[area]" style="color: #000;" type="hidden" value="50106"/>
          <input class="ha_search_btn" id="kw_btn" type="submit" value="Search"/>
          <div id="keyword_search_dropdown">
          </div>
          <div class="clear">
          </div>
         </form>

              <img alt="Check out tours and activites from Lanai, Hawaii." src="https://file.veltra.com/en/promotion/ha/ctg_img/lanai.jpg"/>
             </a>
             <div class="link">
              <a href="/en/hawaii/lanai/">
               <span class="title">
                Lanai
               </span>
              </a>
             </div>
             <!-- END link -->
            </div>
            <!-- END ac_block -->
           </div>
           <!-- END centralize_wrapper -->
          </div>
          <!-- END content -->
         </div>
         <!-- END StartingPoint -->

         <!-- END FiveStar -->
         <div class="renewal_section recommend_ac_wrapper" id="recommender_pc211">
         </div>
         <div id="__se_hint" style="display: none;">
          <div id="__se_spec_pc211">
           <span class="__se_num">
            4
           </span>
           <span class="__se_cat">
            EN_50106
           </span>
          </div>
         </div>
         <script>
          var recommendAcRandomKey = guid();
 ReadRecommendAcCookie("recommendAcCookieId");
 var recommendAcCookieId;
 var recommendAcCookieIdValue;
 ValidateRecommendAcCookieExist("recommendAcCookieId");
 
 // Random Key Generator
 function guid() {
   return s4() + s4() + '-' + s4() + '-' + s4() + '-' +
     s4() + '-' + s4() + s4() + s4();
 }
 function s4() {
   return Math.floor((1 + Math.random()) * 0x10000)
     .toString(16)
     .substring(1);
 }
 
 function ReadRecommendAcCookie(cookieName) {
     var allcookies = document.cookie;
     cookiearray  = allcookies.split(';');
     for(var i=0; i<cookiearray.length; i++){
         name = $.trim(cookiearray[i].split('=')[0]); //use trim function to trim out white space
         value = $.trim(cookiearray[i].split('=')[1]);
         if(name == "recommendAcCookieId") {
             recommendAcCookieIdValue = value;
             return recommendAcCookieIdValue;
         }
     }
 }
 
 function WriteRecommendAcCookie(cookieName) {
     var expireDate = new Date();
     expireDate.setTime(expireDate.getTime()+(1000 * 60 * 60 * 336)); // cookie valid till 2 weeks (millisecond * sec * mins * hours)
     var cookievalue= recommendAcRandomKey;
     document.cookie=cookieName+"=" + cookievalue + ';expires=' + expireDate.toUTCString() + ';path=/';
 }
 
 function ValidateRecommendAcCookieExist(param) {
     if (recommendAcCookieIdValue) {
         //If user has registered cookie ID before, do nothing
     } else {
         WriteRecommendAcCookie(param);
     }
 }
 
 
 (function() {
 if (recommendAcCookieIdValue == null) {
 	recommendAcCookieIdValue = recommendAcRandomKey;
 }
 var s = document.createElement('script');
 s.type = 'text/javascript';
 s.async = true;
 s.src = '//veltra.silveregg.net/suite/page?m=veltra&p=pc_etop&cookie=' + recommendAcCookieIdValue + '&t='+(new Date()).getTime()+'&r='+escape(document.referrer);
 var e = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
 e.parentNode.insertBefore(s,e);
 })();
         </script>
        </div>
        <!-- END page_content -->
        <div class="v1sidebar">
